TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Authorization extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含 Internet 服务器的身份验证消息。

span.span: Contains an authentication message for an Internet server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的实例类，该类包含一个身份验证消息。The returns an instance of the class that contains an authentication message. 此消息发送到 Internet 服务器，则指示客户端 (如或其后代之一) 有权访问服务器。This message is sent to the Internet server to indicate that the client (such as or one of its descendants) is authorized to access the server. 实例由身份验证模块创建的指定用来处理该请求。The instance is created by the authentication module that the designates to handle the request.

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string token) cil managed

param.name: token
param.span: 服务器预期的已加密授权消息。

span.span: The encrypted authorization message expected by the server.

summary.span: 用指定的授权消息创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified authorization message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用创建实例属性设置为`token`和属性设置为`true`。The instance is created with the property set to `token` and the property set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建对象。The following code example shows how to create an object. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For a complete example, refer to the class. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Complete As Boolean
public: property bool Complete { bool get(); };

span.span: Gets the completion status of the authorization.

value.span: 如果身份验证过程已完成，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the authentication process is complete; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为`true`完成客户端和服务器之间的身份验证过程。The property is set to `true` when the authentication process between the client and the server is finished. 某些身份验证模块，如 Kerberos 模块中，使用多个客户端和服务器之间的往返过程来完成身份验证过程。Some authentication modules, such as the Kerberos module, use multiple round trips between the client and server to complete the authentication process. 若要保留或启动从中断的身份验证过程，授权在进行时，身份验证模块集的子代属性`false`。To keep the or descendant that initiated the authentication process from interrupting while authorization is taking place, the authentication module sets the property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来获取授权的完成状态。The following code example uses the property to get the completion status of the authorization. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For a complete example, refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConnectionGroupId As String
public: property System::String ^ ConnectionGroupId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用户特定连接的唯一标识符。

span.span: Gets a unique identifier for user-specific connections.

value.span: 将连接与身份验证实体关联起来的唯一字符串。

span.span: A unique string that associates a connection with an authenticating entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是将连接与特定的身份验证实体相关联的唯一字符串。The property is a unique string that associates a connection with a specific authenticating entity. 例如，NTLM 授权模块会绑定到特定的连接，以防止无效重复使用此连接的身份验证凭据信息。For example, the NTLM authorization module ties the authentication credential information to a specific connection to prevent invalid reuse of the connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来获取由服务器返回的组标识符。The following code example uses the property to get the group identifier returned by the server. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For a complete example, refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取为响应身份验证质询而返回给服务器的消息。

span.span: Gets the message returned to the server in response to an authentication challenge.

value.span: 为响应身份验证质询而返回给服务器的消息。

span.span: The message that will be returned to the server in response to an authentication challenge.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含在访问受保护资源时，客户端将返回到服务器的授权字符串。The property contains the authorization string that the client will return to the server when accessing protected resources. 由客户端和服务器所使用的身份验证类型定义的消息的实际内容。The actual contents of the message are defined by the authentication type the client and server are using. 基本 HTTP 身份验证，例如，使用比 Kerberos 身份验证不同的消息。Basic HTTP authentication, for example, uses a different message than Kerberos authentication. 当身份验证模块支持预身份验证，属性不会发送初始请求。When an authentication module supports preauthentication, the property is sent with the initial request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性以获取消息返回到对身份验证质询的响应中的服务器。The following code example uses the property to get the message returned to the server in response to an authentication challenge. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For a complete example, refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MutuallyAuthenticated { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值指示是否发生了相互身份验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether mutual authentication occurred.

value.span: 如果客户端和服务器均经过验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if both client and server were authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回`false`如果未完成身份验证。This property returns `false` if the authentication has not completed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ ProtectionRealm { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可以用 属性验证的统一资源标识符 (URI) 的前缀。

span.span: Gets or sets the prefix for Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) that can be authenticated with the property.

value.span: 包含 URI 前缀的字符串数组。

span.span: An array of strings that contains URI prefixes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含一个列表的 URI 前缀属性可以用于进行身份验证。The property contains a list of URI prefixes that the property can be used to authenticate. 和其后代进行比较以确定此列表的 URI特定 uri 无效。 and its descendants compare a URI to this list to determine if the is valid for a particular URI. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取或设置可以使用进行身份验证的 Uri 前缀属性。The following code example gets or sets the prefix for URIs that can be authenticated with the property. [!code-cpp[Authorization_ProtectionRealm#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Authorization_ProtectionRealm/CPP/authorization_protectionrealm.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Authorization_ProtectionRealm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Authorization_ProtectionRealm/CS/authorization_protectionrealm.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Authorization_ProtectionRealm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Authorization_ProtectionRealm/VB/authorization_protectionrealm.vb#1)]
